item.title: Stick out
item.description: Everyone prepares for failure, but what happens when you find success? Grant Cardone: “Most people never go far enough in getting recognized, gaining attention, and making a big splash; they are trying to protect a reputation, a position, or some already achieved state. The successful are willing to take gambles â€“ to put it all out there and know, regardless of the outcome, that they can go back and do it again.
